result.pre: is a mosquito-borne disease caused by yellow fever virus (YFV)

result.pre: rate of up to 60% (Monath and Vasconcelos, 2015). YFV
result.post: can be prevented by the attenuated 17D vaccine and

result.pre: and vaccination campaigns has significantly reduced the incidence of YFV

result.post: that can be used not only for treating infected

result.pre: only for treating infected patients, but also for the prophylactic

result.pre: individuals). Presently, there is no antiviral drug available for the
